title: HAAAALP MEEEE
body:
I just got an S- on Fizz, a champ I own, and got no chest.
On my profile it says that I have 2 chests left, and this happened before also, when I for an S on the same champ.
What's wrong?

replies.body:
You won't get any if you already received a chest for that champion.
It's 1 chest for 1 champion
Thanks... I just got another S+ on him lol.
Keep in mind you can only get one mastery chest per champion per season. Once the next season starts you'll be able to earn another chest for getting an S with Fizz.
